reviewText: Great songs from a great slide stylist that Ry Cooder considers an essential master of the form.  Tom Feldmann does a great job of detailing BWJ's bottlenecking style. Tom takes you through the pieces phrase-by-phrase and the camera work is the usual SGGW excellent.  Get the complete recorded works to go with the lesson.  It's essential listening.

Good guide to how Willie played, for more tips plus all lyrics deciphered, life story etc. See also this book!

http://www.amazon.com/Revelation-Blind-Willie-Johnson-Biography/dp/1430328991/ref=pd_sim_mov_6
